name: Frogspawn Rampage (Demo)
description:
THIS IS A DEMO

Nothing here is final so remember to ask for any bug fixes or changes in the comments

Frogspawn Rampage is a highly challenging top-down shooter that takes inspiration from classics like Smash TV and Nuclear Throne.

The Kraken King is enjoying his underwater empire while he uses tadpoles to work for him at minimal pay, but now his tadpoles are becoming frogs and leaving to the land. In an effort to restore his kingdom he makes his minions go to land and take back all the frogs that left him. You and your refugee friends must eliminate the Kraken before it's too late.

  • 2 modes, Arcade (endless hoards of enemies) and Campaign (roguelike mode)
  • 3 unique characters with different guns and stats
  • 11 perks to switch up the gameplay
  • 4 power-ups to enhance your abilities
  • Fast paced chaotic and difficult gameplay
  • Add 2 more bosses to campaign mode
  • Add 2 more areas to campaign mode
  • Make skins that can be bought with ingame currency or earned from completing challenges
  • Integrate story into campaign mode
  • Add a leaderboard to arcade mode
  • iOS support
  • Local multiplayer (co-op)

I want this game to be as close to perfect as I can get it when I fully release it, and I'm not completely sure when that will be. My prediction is that It'll be done by late 2023 or early 2024 but knowing the challenges of developing this game alone with the exception of @pitifulrock (the game's composer), it might take much longer.

Remember to give feedback so that the game will be in it's best state on release, thanks!
